text: Dejiya iyaga meesha aad deggan tihiin, hadba sida karaankiinnu yahay, oo ha dhibina si aad u cidhiidhidaan. Oo haddii ay leeyihiin uur, masruufa intay ka dhigaan culeyskooda. markaas haddii ay idiin nuujiyaan (ilmaha), siiya gunnadooda, oo is fara dhexdeenna sama falka, oo haddii aad is khilaaftaan markaa mid kale ayaa u nuujin
